00045 namespace TabControlProperties
00046 {
00056 class TabHeight : public Property
00057 {
00058 public:
00059         TabHeight() : Property(
00060                 "TabHeight",
00061                 "Property to get/set the height of the tabs.",
00062                 "{0.050000,0.000000}")
00063         {}
00064 
00065         String  get(const PropertyReceiver* receiver) const;
00066         void    set(PropertyReceiver* receiver, const String& value);
00067 };
00068 
00078 class TabTextPadding : public Property
00079 {
00080 public:
00081     TabTextPadding() : Property(
00082                 "TabTextPadding", 
00083                 "Property to get/set the padding either side of the tab buttons.",
00084                 "{0.000000,5.000000}")
00085         {}
00086 
00087     String      get(const PropertyReceiver* receiver) const;
00088     void        set(PropertyReceiver* receiver, const String& value);
00089 };
00090

00104                 "TabPanePosition",
